text: Charles de Ganahl Koch (, ; born November 1, 1935) is an American businessman. Koch was born in Wichita, Kansas. His net worth is $41 billion per Forbes.com. He is number five on Bloomberg's Billionaires list. In 1980 he started the Charles Koch Foundation along with his brother David. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:American billionaires Category:American philanthropists Category:Businesspeople from Wichita, Kansas Category:Republicans (United States) Category:Koch family Category:Living people
title: Charles Koch
